_xResult.title: Instant Love Kaftan
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made patterned maxi dress with waist-tie
_xResult.longdesc:
An unforgettable vacation starts with an unforgettable wardrobe! This custom made kaftan/caftan dress made out of luxurious chiffon fabric will transport you wherever your heart desires in style. Purusing the cliffs of Greece, dancing on the beach in California or simply taking a trip down to the neighbourhood pool—whatever a break means for you, take it in this beautiful maxi dress.

 

This dress features a simple fabric belt around the waist and raglan sleeves. 

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let the designer know using the button below.
